topic.title: MySQL Index
topic.section: The MySQL Index Search Plugin implements a simple MySQL-based search plugin. When enabled, users will see a Search link from the top navigation bar, as well as a search field in the sidebar. The search field to the right searches the entire MySQL index, whereas clicking the top Search link will bring the user to a more comprehensive search page, where searches can be run against all, some or one archive at a time, and where specific keywords can be used against applicable metadata fields.
